name: Spaceship PVP
description:
Hi, I just started my game developement journey.

This is the first short game I made for practising and getting experience, it's a short local multiplayer game about destroying your friend's ship. Originally was intended as a singleplayer Space Invaders-like, but I ended up with this.

It has different keyboard configurations and controller support.

I still have ideas I want to implement here, so probably I will make a new version adding more gameplay variety
